Package org.opensextant.xtext.collectors

Interface CollectionListener


  • public interface CollectionListener

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void collected​(File doc)
      Listen for collected raw files.
      void collected​(ConvertedDocument doc, String filepath)
      Listen for collected and converted document.
      boolean exists​(String oid)
      If the item identified by ID already exists, the collector will pass by it quietly

    • Method Detail

      • collected

        void collected​(ConvertedDocument doc,
               String filepath)
        throws IOException
        Listen for collected and converted document.
        Parameters:
        doc - converted document
        filepath - raw path
        Throws:
        IOException - on I/O failure, e.g., doc/file path could not be recorded by your app.

      • collected

        void collected​(File doc)
        throws IOException
        Listen for collected raw files.
        Parameters:
        doc - a file object as seen by your collection/harvester implementation.
        Throws:
        IOException - on I/O failure

      • exists

        boolean exists​(String oid)
        If the item identified by ID already exists, the collector will pass by it quietly
        Parameters:
        oid - object ID to check against some data store
        Returns:
        true if item exists in the caller's collection. Implementor can then make a decision what to do if item exists or not.
